alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Escambia, southern Covington and Okaloosa Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Geneva to 4 miles southwest of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Niceville, Florala, Baker, Laurel Hill and Lockhart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
